name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-imagecard-worldclock
title: Image Card World Clock
shortDescription: An Adaptive Card Extension that shows the current time for different timezones.
longDescription: This solution shows how to show the current time for different timezones using an Adaptive Card Extension. The ACE shows the local time in the card and shows the current time in different timezones (America, Europe, Asia and Australia) in the quick view.
